DOC.brief_summary: Capnography provide noninvasive monitoring ventilation allow early recognition alter respiration pattern apnea . The aim prospective study compare detection apnea prediction oxygen desaturation hypoxemia capnography versus clinical surveillance procedural sedation percutaneous transhepatic cholangiodrainage ( PTCD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Capnography During Percutaneous Transhepatic Cholangiodrainage ( PTCD ) ( HepaBreath )
DOC.criteria: Age > =18 Scheduled PTCD midazolam propofol sedation age le 18 year ASA class V allergy narcotic drug pregnancy preexist hypotension , bradycardia hypoxemia
